Text:
Hi Lord Terabyte, sorry this isn't related to this release, but I just wanted to say to one Japanese film lover to another, just how grateful I am to you fo so many unique and wonderful films you have shared over the years which I wouldn't otherwise have been able to find. Even when I lived in Japan I couldn't find some films and so, well thank you. 

Especially in the climate we face ourselves, people like you who take the time, effort to share with others, due thanks and respect is due. 

Like many others here, I end up buying a great many of the films I download too ^^

Keep up the great work mate!
